$interpreted:
Naya: ...And then he says, "As if I want to!" 
How could he say that!?
Angelia: Uh-huh~
Naya: Angel, why are you smirking...?
Angelia: Naya, are you...in love?
Naya: Im-Impossible...
Angelia: You've been talking non-stop about Nigel for quite a while now, you know...

Naya: N-No... That's not true! He's a rude brute, an arrogant show-off! 
I...
Angelia: So that's what Naya likes? So how would you describe Nigel...
Angelia: ...Very masculine?
Naya: Well, he does have a gentle side, and he looked totally handsome when he rescued me...
Angelia: Yep, you are totally in love~
Naya: But just look at me. A total tomboy... Even if I did care about him, there's no way that he'd fall in love with me, right?
Angelia: It's not about how Nigel sees you. It's about how you think of yourself.
Angelia: These past few years, I've already had several blind dates...
Naya: Blind dates!?
Angelia: For political concerns, I'll probably marry some noble that I could care less about.
Angelia: Falling in love has never been an option.
Naya: Angel...
Angelia: So I said to myself, if people around me are troubled by love, I will do my best to support them.
Angelia: That way, at least I can get a taste of what love feels like.
Angelia: So go for it. I'll support you!
Naya: W-Wait! Are you telling me to confess to him? I'm not mentally or physically prepared to do that!
Angelia: Don't worry about it! You've got charm!
Naya: That's not the problem...
Angelia: What's that noise!?
Naya: I'll check it out. You stay here!
Nigel: Look out!
Naya: That was scary... Thanks.
Nigel: Hey, you're injured.
Nigel: You got bit on your calf. Go to the tent and get it patched up.
Naya: Nigel, wait!
Naya: Th-Thanks for always saving me...
Nigel: Didn't you just thank me?
Naya: Errr... Wh-What I wanted to say was...
Nigel: Ah, right. I have something to tell you!
Naya: You do!? What do you want to talk about?
Nigel: After we return to Kingdom of the Sun, we'll carry out the plan immediately.
Nigel: I still have some questions about the specifics. Mind if I discuss that with you later?
Naya: Oh, yeah. No problem...
Nigel: Then let's go back to camp. Before the rune chariot is ready, there are still plenty of things to tend to.
Nigel: By the way, what did you want to tell me back there?
Naya: It's nothing. I'll tell you once everything is settled.
Nigel: What, you can't tell me now?
Naya: Sh-Shut up... I just feel like making you wait, that's all.
Naya: Now get moving!

Model.Text:
...And then he says, "As if I want to!" 
How could he say that!?
Uh-huh~
Angel, why are you smirking...?
Naya, are you...in love?
Im-Impossible...
You've been talking non-stop about Nigel for quite a while now, you know...

N-No... That's not true! He's a rude brute, an arrogant show-off! 
I...
So that's what Naya likes? So how would you describe Nigel...
...Very masculine?
Well, he does have a gentle side, and he looked totally handsome when he rescued me...
Yep, you are totally in love~
But just look at me. A total tomboy... Even if I did care about him, there's no way that he'd fall in love with me, right?
It's not about how Nigel sees you. It's about how you think of yourself.
These past few years, I've already had several blind dates...
Blind dates!?
For political concerns, I'll probably marry some noble that I could care less about.
Falling in love has never been an option.
Angel...
So I said to myself, if people around me are troubled by love, I will do my best to support them.
That way, at least I can get a taste of what love feels like.
So go for it. I'll support you!
W-Wait! Are you telling me to confess to him? I'm not mentally or physically prepared to do that!
Don't worry about it! You've got charm!
That's not the problem...
What's that noise!?
I'll check it out. You stay here!
Look out!
That was scary... Thanks.
Hey, you're injured.
You got bit on your calf. Go to the tent and get it patched up.
Nigel, wait!
Th-Thanks for always saving me...
Didn't you just thank me?
Errr... Wh-What I wanted to say was...
Ah, right. I have something to tell you!
You do!? What do you want to talk about?
After we return to Kingdom of the Sun, we'll carry out the plan immediately.
I still have some questions about the specifics. Mind if I discuss that with you later?
Oh, yeah. No problem...
Then let's go back to camp. Before the rune chariot is ready, there are still plenty of things to tend to.
By the way, what did you want to tell me back there?
It's nothing. I'll tell you once everything is settled.
What, you can't tell me now?
Sh-Shut up... I just feel like making you wait, that's all.
Now get moving!
